name: Densify
flavor: Greatly increase the effect of gravity on target material.

purposeDescriptions.low: subtly increases the weight of the target
purposeDescriptions.mid: shackles the target by amplifying their weight
purposeDescriptions.high: crushes the target under their own weight
purposeDescriptions.invLow: subtly relieves the weight of the target
purposeDescriptions.invMid: almost entirely frees a target from the weight of gravity
purposeDescriptions.invHigh: frees the target from the shackles of gravity
